content:
Create a Broadcast Topic for Broadcast Slack Messages

To let incident teams send broadcast Slack messages, create at least one broadcast topic. Users can then send broadcast Slack messages to Slack channels based on a broadcast topic.

Available in: Lightning Experience with standard Service Cloud license
Available in: Professional, Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions

Before creating a broadcast topic:

Review or create broadcast channels in Slack.
Create a broadcast topic type or use the default type.

If you already have a broadcast topic, skip to assigning it to a Slack channel.

From Setup, enter Customer Service Incident Management, then click Customer Service Incident Management.
Click Create & Assign.
Select New.
Enter name and description, select a broadcast type.
Select Incident Communication as broadcast reason.
Save changes.

Assign this topic to a Slack channel.
title: Creating and Assigning Broadcast Topics in Service Cloud
